title: Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site: Park Home
body: Enter Pennsylvaniaâ€™s oldest church   Before Pennsylvania there was New Sweden. Discover this last historic link to a forgotten past. Visit the church's pastoral surroundings and its burial ground of patriots and ordinary citizens alike.              Visit Gloria Dei Church   Stroll the grounds and explore the simple interior of this colonial church. It's only a short car or bus ride from Independence Hall.
